msg: Added new test harness that works against dom4j 0.91 that demonstrates working XSLT patterns

author: jstrachan
msg: Added patch to allow <xtags:style> tag to be used inside another custom tag (or pipelined together). Also added a test case kindly supplied by Martin Brown - many thanks Martin!

author: jstrachan
msg: Patch applied so that XTags will work fine with the latest 0.9 release of dom4j
